name: Player Selection Game
briefDescription: A web-based cricket player selection game with a budget management system.

details.description: This project allows users to select cricket players while managing their budget. Users can build their own team and keep track of their expenses.
challenges: Managing the dynamic updates of player selection and budget.
Ensuring the UI is responsive and works well on all devices.
Handling edge cases like exceeding the budget or selecting more players than allowed.
improvements: I plan to add multiplayer functionality in the future.
Improving performance for larger teams by optimizing the code and reducing unnecessary re-renders.
Adding player statistics to help users make better decisions while selecting players.

name: Discount PRO
briefDescription: A coupon collecting platform to find and apply discount codes from popular e-commerce stores in Bangladesh.

details.description: Discount PRO helps users find and use discount coupons to save money while shopping online.
challenges: Integrating third-party APIs for coupon fetching and applying them to the user's cart.
Maintaining a smooth user experience when the API response times vary.
Ensuring security and protection of user data during the coupon application process.
improvements: Planning to add a mobile app version of the platform for better accessibility.
Future updates will include a user rating system for coupons to provide more value to users.

name: Chill Gaming
briefDescription: A gaming website offering exciting games and competitions for players to participate in and win prizes.

details.description: Chill Gaming provides a platform for gaming enthusiasts to participate in online competitions and win prizes.
challenges: Building real-time multiplayer features for online competitions.
Optimizing the user interface to handle a large number of concurrent users.
Managing server-side logic for game result tracking and prize distribution.
improvements: Integrating live streaming features for major gaming events.
Enhancing multiplayer functionality to support larger teams and tournaments.
Improving the backend to handle a larger scale of players and game sessions.
